name: Manga Adventure Run
description:
A GREAT GAME
Manga Adventure Run Is a love letter to the platforming and adventure games of the past.
Adventure game with monsters and dangerous paths.
-old school jump and run platform / obstacles runner
-classic platformer for kids, children and adults
-side-scroller gameplay with easy game console pad controls
-easy and free to play - hard to master

How To use:
- Use the buttons to move forward, backward and jump. Shoot the enemies
-Try not to touch enemies
-collect coins and unlock all worlds and characters
